LanguageData.VRE_EnableCatHighmates: Enable "Cat genes" on Highmates (requires game restart)
LanguageData.VRE_EnableCatHighmatesDescription: Disabling this toggle will make newly created Highmates appear without the Feline ears and Feline tail genes. Bear in mind this will have no effect on already existing Highmates. Will require a game reload.
LanguageData.VRE_LovinNeedDesc: These people have a too low lovin' need (less than 50%). If they reach 0% lovin' in approximately 15 days, they will attempt to leave the colony:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.VRE_MessageCantUseLovinOnOtherFactions: This ability can't be used on members of other factions
LanguageData.VRE_MessageCantUseLovinOnResistingPerson: This ability can't be used on enemies
LanguageData.VRE_CantUseLovinLowOpinion: {0} cannot initiate lovin’ with {1} as {1} has too low opinion of {0} (Opinion of {0}: {2})
LanguageData.VRE_TooYoungForLovin: {0} cannot initiate lovin’ with {1} as {1} is too young.
LanguageData.VRE_TooYoungForLovinCaster: {0} cannot initiate lovin’ with {1} as {0} is too young.
LanguageData.VRE_CantUseLovinWithTraitAsexual: {0} cannot initiate lovin’ with {1} as {1} is Asexual.
LanguageData.VRE_CantUseLovinWithTraitPrude: {0} cannot initiate lovin’ with {1} as {1} is a Prude.
LanguageData.VRE_RelationshipWillBreak: {0} will initiate lovin’ with {1}, despite being in a relationship with {2}. This will result in a break up.
LanguageData.VRE_RelationshipWillBreakTarget: {0} will initiate lovin’ with {1}, despite the target, {1}, being in a relationship with {2}. This will result in a break up.
LanguageData.VRE_CantUseOnFamily: {0} can't initiate lovin’ with {1}, as they are blood relatives.
LanguageData.VRE_AwardedHighmateDesc: Due to the newly acquired Baron rank, the Empire has awarded {0} with the presence of a Highmate, who will immediately join the colony.\n\nDesigned companions and concubines with a unique ability to psychically bond with a mate, highmates are empathic, beautiful, cheerful, and talented in social matters. They are also inept at manual tasks, physically weak, and mentally incapable of violence.
